import { ButtonSolid, Grid, Box, Text, Icon, CryptoCard } from 'design-system'; import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { getCryptoData } from "../../Repositories/CryptoRepository" export const Dashboard = () => { const [data, setData] = useState("") const [busy, setBusy] = useState(true) useEffect(() => { loadCryptoData() }, []); const loadCryptoData = async () => { setBusy(true); try { const data = await getCryptoData(); const json = await data.json(); setData(json) } catch (e) { console.log("Ha ocurrido un error") } setBusy(false) } return (<>

Recent

 {!busy && console.log(data.name) && <> } loadCryptoData()} > Show all transactions ); };
